cab.content: From Viceroy, 12th June 1919. (Received 13th, noon.)Clear the line.862 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Tashkend wireless of 4th June reported to Moscow arrival at Tashkend of Afghan Mission under General Wali Muhammad Khan, and asked whether Mission could be sent to Moscow via Fort Alexandrovsk.Following wireless from Tashkend (corrupt group) Quetta, was received on 10th June at Quetta :-" [R.] To Mr. Wilson (?) President, United States of America. My dear Sir, 1 have the honour to inform you that I; with my three councillors by His Majesty's Government (? of) Afghanistan are granted the honour to be official delegates to take part in Peace Conference and meet you, as we express (? feelings) of our Government, and by your just help justify rights of our nation which are cancelled by the (?) entente. Yours sincerely (?) Muhammad (?) Wali Khan, envoy extraordinary (?) for Afghans."
